short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete All Messages from Facebook Messenger in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension lets you to remove all Facebook messages (including group messages) by one click without having to delete one by one.

❗️❗️❗️ The Chrome extension is in no way associated with Facebook and its partners
